com.kousikraj.bootstrap.services
Interface Service

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractService, DummyService, TestService
public interface Service

This is the primary interface where all the methods needed for Service implementation is defined. See AbstractService for abstract implementation of Service

Author:
KousikRaj
